meanings.sent1: She enjoys pedestaling her favorite toy on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The artist was pedestaling the sculpture in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The children were pedestaling their pet rock as a king in their game.
meanings.sent4: The teacher was pedestaling the student's artwork as the best in the class.
meanings.sent5: The museum was pedestaling the ancient artifact for all visitors to admire.

meanings.definition: To treat or regard with exaggerated respect or admiration.
meanings.sent1: He was pedestaling the famous actor by asking for an autograph.
meanings.sent2: The fans were pedestaling the singer by cheering loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The students were pedestaling their teacher by bringing her gifts.
meanings.sent4: The company was pedestaling the CEO by throwing a grand party in his honor.
meanings.sent5: The community was pedestaling the local hero for his brave actions.
